title: How to Make a Sweet Potato Crunch Casserole

steps.headline: Peel potatoes and cook covered in water with 1 teaspoon salt.
Cook until inserted fork goes into potatoes easily.
Drain off the water and let cool completely.
Whip together the potatoes, sugar, eggs, milk.
steps.description: Use a whisk or large spoon to whip the potato mixture.

steps.headline: Pour mixture into a greased 9 x 13 x 2 or 8 x 12 x 1 cake pan.
Mix brown sugar, flour, and pecans.
Sprinkle the pecan mixture over the top of the sweet potato mixture.
Melt butter and pour over top of pecan mixture.
Bake at 350 F degrees for 45 minutes.

text: Peel potatoes and cook covered in water with 1 teaspoon salt.  Cook until inserted fork goes into potatoes easily.  Drain off the water and let cool completely.  Whip together the potatoes, sugar, eggs, milk. Use a whisk or large spoon to whip the potato mixture. Pour mixture into a greased 9 x 13 x 2 or 8 x 12 x 1 cake pan.  Mix brown sugar, flour, and pecans.  Sprinkle the pecan mixture over the top of the sweet potato mixture.  Melt butter and pour over top of pecan mixture.  Bake at 350 F degrees for 45 minutes.  Finished.
